prod_desc: Dance with Cinderella and the Prince in the Magical Castle!
prod_long_desc:
Disney Cinderella fans will love recreating the ball scene with the Prince in this beautiful castle. Turn the gear wheels to make them dance, but remember to keep an eye on the clock! Develop early construction skills with this easy-to-build set with iconic accessories and decorated bricks to bring the magic to life. Includes two LEGO® DUPLO® figures: Cinderella and Prince Charming, plus a bird figure.
Includes two LEGO® DUPLO® figures: Cinderella and Prince Charming, plus a bird figure.
Features an iconic Cinderella castle with blue turrets, dance floor with turning gear wheels, stairs, upstairs room with a bed, and a vanity with opening drawer.
Includes bricks decorated as a clock, a mirror and windows as story starters.
Accessory elements include two chairs, a plate decorated with pumpkins, and a fabric blanket.
Encourage early role-play skills with these much-loved Disney Princess™ characters.
Young children will love helping Cinderella dance the night away with the turning gear wheels.
Help your child master basic construction skills by building and rebuilding this easy-to-build model.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 2-5.
Cinderella’s Magical Castle (excluding stairs) measures over 10” high, 7” wide and 7” long.
